creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: night scene over water with lights in buildings on shore at left; several barge-like boats at right center
marks: left: 自刻  昭和十四年  夜の東京  両國橋より {Jikoku, Shōwa jūyone LRC, in black: 遠志 {Tōshi}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: From the Ryogoku Bridge
